description: Installation of new roof plant and associated duct and pipe work to upper roof level. Raising brick parapet at upper roof level to match existing for screening.  Erection of screening to existing plant at lower roof level, along with associated works and alterations.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Design and Access Statement Version 2.00 dated July 2011; PEL285268B-1-M003/ E; M004/ C; Unnumbered Drawing (Indicating Frames to be Placed); 104 Rev P2; P501 P1; Schedule Reference Cul, Roof Plant rev A; City University CHP Project Noise Specification ref: PEL285268B; Summary Performance Report For 30XA1102; 576-001(P)A; 576-201(P)A; 576-051(P); 576-101(P)A; 576-031(P)A; 576-028(P); A576-251(P)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
